monogr.author: Aeschylus
monogr.title: Aeschylus, with an English translation by Herbert Weir Smyth, Ph. D. in two volumes. 2.Libation Bearers

imprint.publisher: Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press; London, William Heinemann, Ltd.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
tagged corrupt words with the NOPARSE tag; see the text log for a list
Fixed card breaks at 84, 650 and 1010 for lines affected by metrics.

$Log: aesch.lib_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.1  2009-10-09 19:49:18  rsingh04
more reorganizing of texts module by collection

Revision 1.1  2009/10/07 20:59:53  rsingh04
began reorganizing texts module by collection.  created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files

Revision 1.3  2005/08/01 15:44:56  packel
really removed item tags

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 15:32:41  packel
removed stray item tags

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 14:27:08  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.8  2004/04/21 20:28:10  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.7  2003/07/01 22:14:25  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.6  2000/03/04 20:33:49  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.5  2000/02/17 17:46:03  amahoney
use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks;  put cards at ends of
such speeches after the close tag;  put sp and speaker tags on the divs
of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so
we lost the speaker info)

Revision 1.4  1999/12/22 22:20:25  amahoney
convert to p3

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: swth\r genou= moi cu/mmaxo/s t' ai)toume/nw|:
h(/kw ga\r e)s gh=n th/nde kai\ kate/rxomai.
tu/mbou d' e)p' o)/xqw| tw=|de khru/ssw patri\
ou) ga\r parw\n w)/|mwca so/n, pa/ter, mo/ron
ou)d' e)ce/teina xei=r' e)p' e)kfora=|  nekrou=.>

l.#text: ti/ xrh=ma leu/ssw; ti/s poq' h(/d' o(mh/guris

l: h)\ patri\ tw)mw=| ta/sd' e)peika/sas tu/xw
ou)de/n pot' a)/llo: kai\ ga\r *)hle/ktran dokw=

stei/xein a)delfh
 th
 e)mh
 pe/nqei lugrw=|
pre/pousan.  w)= *zeu=, do/s me tei/sasqai  mo/ron
patro/s, genou= de\ su/mmaxos qe/lwn e)moi/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: di' ai)w=nos d' i)ugmoi=si  bo/sketai ke/ar.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ti/ ga\r lu/tron  peso/ntos ai(/matos pe/doi;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: se/bas d' a)/maxon a)da/maton  a)po/lemon to\ pri\n

l: tai de/ tis.  to\ d' eu)tuxei=n,

l.#text: to/d' e)n brotoi=s  qeo/s te kai\ qeou= ple/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: di' ai(/mat' e)kpoqe/nq'  u(po\ xqono\s trofou=

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)/kos, po/roi te pa/ntes e)k mia=s o(dou=

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: di/kaia kai\ mh\ di/kaia a)rxa\s pre/pon

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
l: ti/ fw= xe/ousa  ta/sde khdei/ous xoa/s;
pw=s eu)/fron'  ei)/pw, pw=s kateu/comai patri/;
po/tera le/gousa para\ fi/lhs fi/lw| fe/rein

l.#text: gunaiko\s a)ndri/, th=s e)mh=s mhtro\s pa/ra;

l: tw=nd' ou) pa/resti qa/rsos, ou)d' e)/xw ti/ fw=,
xe/ousa to/nde pe/lanon e)n tu/mbw| patro/s.
h)\ tou=to fa/skw tou)/pos, w(s no/mos brotoi=s,

l.#text: ste/fh, do/sin ge  tw=n kakw=n e)paci/an;
h)\ si=g' a)ti/mws, w(/sper ou)=n a)pw/leto

l: stei/xw kaqa/rmaq' w(/s tis e)kpe/myas pa/lin

l.#text: th=sd' e)ste\ boulh=s, w)= fi/lai, metai/tiai:

l: koino\n ga\r e)/xqos e)n do/mois nomi/zomen.
mh\ keu/qet' e)/ndon kardi/as fo/bw| tino/s.
to\ mo/rsimon ga\r to/n t' e)leu/qeron me/nei
kai\ to\n pro\s a)/llhs despotou/menon xero/s.

l.#text: le/gois a)/n, ei)/ ti tw=nd' e)/xois u(pe/rteron.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ai)doume/nh soi bwmo\n w(s tu/mbon patro\s
le/cw, keleu/eis ga/r, to\n e)k freno\s lo/gon.

sp.l: le/gois a)/n, w(/sper h)|de/sw ta/fon patro/s.

sp.l: fqe/ggou xe/ousa kedna\  toi=sin eu)/frosin.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra

l.#text: kh=ruc me/giste  tw=n a)/nw te kai\ ka/tw,
tou\s gh=s e)/nerqe dai/monas klu/ein e)ma\s

l: kai\ *gai=an au)th/n, h(\ ta\ pa/nta ti/ktetai,
qre/yasa/ t' au)=qis tw=nde ku=ma lamba/nei:

l.#text: le/gw kalou=sa pate/r', e)poi/ktiro/n  t' e)me\

l: peprame/noi  ga\r nu=n ge/ pws a)lw/meqa
pro\s th=s tekou/shs, a)/ndra d' a)nthlla/cato

l.#text: ka)gw\ me\n a)nti/doulos: e)k de\ xrhma/twn

l: e)n toi=si soi=s po/noisi  xli/ousin me/ga.
e)lqei=n d' *)ore/sthn deu=ro su\n tu/xh| tini\
kateu/xomai/ soi, kai\ su\ klu=qi/ mou, pa/ter:

l.#text: au)th=| te/ moi do\s swfroneste/ran  polu\
h(mi=n me\n eu)xa\s ta/sde, toi=s d' e)nanti/ois
tau=t' e)n me/sw| ti/qhmi th=s kalh=s  a)ra=s,

l: kei/nois le/gousa th/nde th\n kakh\n a)ra/n:
h(mi=n de\ pompo\s i)/sqi tw=n e)sqlw=n a)/nw,
su\n qeoi=si kai\ gh=| kai\ di/kh| nikhfo/rw|.

l.#text: toiai=sd' e)p' eu)xai=s ta/sd' e)pispe/ndw xoa/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pro\s e)/ruma to/de kakw=n, kednw=n t'
kexume/nwn xoa=n.  klu/e de/ moi, klu/e, se/-
bas w)=  de/spot', e)c a)maura=s freno/s.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
l: e)/xei me\n h)/dh gapo/tous  xoa\s path/r:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: le/gois a)/n: o)rxei=tai  de\ kardi/a fo/bw|.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ou)k e)/stin o(/stis plh\n e)mou= kei/raito/ nin.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kai\ mh\n o(/d' e)sti\ ka/rt' i)dei=n o(mo/pteros

l.#text: poi/ais e)qei/rais; tou=to ga\r qe/lw maqei=n.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: au)toi=sin h(mi=n ka/rta prosferh\s i)dei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mw=n ou)=n *)ore/stou kru/bda dw=ron h)=n  to/de;

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ma/list' e)kei/nou bostru/xois prosei/detai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ pw=s e)kei=nos deu=r' e)to/lmhsen molei=n;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ou)x h(=sson eu)da/kruta/ moi le/geis ta/de,
ei) th=sde xw/ras mh/pote yau/sei  podi/.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
l: xolh=s, e)pai/sqhn  d' w(s diantai/w| be/lei:

l.#text: e)c o)mma/twn de\ di/yioi pi/ptousi/ moi

l: plo/kamon i)dou/sh| to/nde: pw=s ga\r e)lpi/sw
a)stw=n tin' a)/llon th=sde despo/zein fo/bhs;
a)ll' ou)de\ mh/n nin h( ktanou=s' e)kei/rato,
e)gw\ d' o(/pws me\n a)/ntikrus ta/d' ai)ne/sw,
ei)=nai to/d' a)gla/isma/ moi tou= filta/tou

l.#text: ei)/q' ei)=xe fwnh\n eu)/fron' a)gge/lou di/khn,

l: ei)/per g' a)p' e)xqrou= krato\s h)=n tetmhme/nos,
h)\ cuggenh\s w)\n ei)=xe sumpenqei=n e)moi\

l.#text: a)/galma tu/mbou tou=de kai\ timh\n patro/s.
a)ll' ei)do/tas me\n tou\s qeou\s kalou/meqa,

l: strobou/meq': ei) de\ xrh\ tuxei=n swthri/as,
smikrou= ge/noit' a)\n spe/rmatos me/gas puqmh/n.

l.#text: kai\ mh\n sti/boi ge, deu/teron tekmh/rion,

l: podw=n  o(/moioi toi=s t' e)moi=sin e)mferei=s
kai\ ga\r du/' e)sto\n tw/de perigrafa\ podoi=n,
au)tou= t' e)kei/nou kai\ sunempo/rou tino/s.

l.#text: ei)s tau)to\ sumbai/nousi toi=s e)moi=s sti/bois.

l: pa/resti d' w)di\s kai\ frenw=n katafqora/.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: eu)/xou ta\ loipa/, toi=s qeoi=s telesfo/rous

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: e)pei\ ti/ nu=n e(/kati daimo/nwn kurw=;

l.#text: ei)s o)/yin h(/keis w(=nper e)chu/xou   pa/lai.

sp.l: kai\ ti/na su/noisqa/ moi kaloume/nh| brotw=n;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kai\ pro\s ti/ dh=ta tugxa/nw kateugma/twn;

l.#text: i)xnoskopou=sa/ t' e)n sti/boisi toi=s e)moi=s
i)dou= d' u(/fasma tou=to, sh=s e)/rgon xero/s,

l: spa/qhs te plhga\s h)de\  qh/reion  grafh/n.
e)/ndon genou=, xara=| de\ mh\ 'kplagh=|s  fre/nas:
tou\s filta/tous ga\r oi)=da nw=|n o)/ntas pikrou/s.

e)moi/: prosauda=n d' e)st' a)nagkai/ws e)/xon

l.#text: pate/ra te, kai\ to\ mhtro\s e)s se/ moi r(e/pei

l: pisto\s d' a)delfo\s h)=sq', e)moi\ se/bas fe/rwn
mo/nos: *kra/tos te kai\ *di/kh su\n tw=| tri/tw|

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: i)dou= de\ ge/nnan  eu)=nin ai)etou= patro/s,

l.#text: nh=stis pie/zei limo/s: ou) ga\r e)ntelei=s

l: ou(/tw de\ ka)me\ th/nde t', *)hle/ktran le/gw,

a)/mfw fugh
 e)/xonte th
 au)th
 do/mwn.

l.#text: kai\ tou= quth=ros kai/ se timw=ntos me/ga

l: pe/mpein e)/xois a)\n sh/mat' eu)piqh=  brotoi=s:

l.#text: ou)/t' a)rxiko/s soi pa=s o(/d' au)anqei\s puqmh\n

l: ko/miz', a)po\ smikrou= d' a)\n a)/reias  me/gan

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: w)= pai=des, w)= swth=res e(sti/as patro/s,

l.#text: siga=q', o(/pws mh\ peu/setai/ tis, w)= te/kna,

l: glw/sshs xa/rin de\ pa/nt' a)paggei/lh| ta/de
pro\s tou\s kratou=ntas: ou(\s i)/doim' e)gw/ pote

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: ei) mh\ me/teimi tou= patro\s tou\s ai)ti/ous:
au)to\n d' e)/faske th=| fi/lh| yuxh=| ta/de
tei/sein  m' e)/xonta polla\ dusterph= kaka/.
ta\ me\n ga\r e)k gh=s dusfro/nwn mhni/mata
brotoi=s pifau/skwn ei)=pe, ta\s d' ai)nw=n no/sous,
leuka\s de\ ko/rsas th=|d' e)pante/llein  no/sw|:

l.#text: to\ ga\r skoteino\n tw=n e)nerte/rwn be/los

l: kai\ lu/ssa kai\ ma/taios e)k nuktw=n fo/bos
o(rw=nta lampro\n e)n sko/tw| nwmw=nt' o)fru\n
kai\ toi=s toiou/tois ou)/te krath=ros  me/ros
bwmw=n t' a)pei/rgein ou)x o(rwme/nhn patro\s

l.#text: pa/ntwn d' a)/timon ka)/filon qnh/|skein xro/nw|

l: kei) mh\ pe/poiqa, tou)/rgon e)/st' e)rgaste/on.
polloi\ ga\r ei)s e(\n sumpi/tnousin  i(/meroi,

l.#text: qeou= t' e)fetmai\ kai\ patro\s pe/nqos me/ga,
qh/leia ga\r frh/n: ei) de\ mh/, ta/x' ei)/setai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)masxali/sqh  de/ g', w(s to/d' ei)dh=|s:

l.#text: e)/prasse d', a(=|pe/r  nin w(=de qa/ptei,

l.#text: le/geis patrw=|on mo/ron: e)gw\ d' a)pesta/toun

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: se\ toi le/gw, cuggenou=, pa/ter, fi/lois.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: e)gw\ d' e)pifqe/ggomai keklaume/na.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: *)/arhs *)/arei cumbalei=, *di/ka| *di/ka.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: i)w\ qeoi/, krai/net' e)ndi/kws <di/kas.>

l.#text: ai)toume/nw|  moi do\s kra/tos tw=n sw=n do/mwn.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
l: ka)gw/, pa/ter, toia/nde  sou xrei/an e)/xw,

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: ou(/tw ga\r a)/n soi dai=tes e)/nnomoi brotw=n
ktizoi/at': ei) de\ mh/, par' eu)dei/pnois e)/sh|

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra

pa/ntwn de\ prw=ton to/nde presbeu/sw ta/fon.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: w)= *gai=', a)/nes moi pate/r'  e)popteu=sai ma/xhn.

l.#text: w)= *perse/fassa, do\s d' e)/t'  eu)/morfon kra/tos.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: me/mnhso d' a)mfi/blhstron w(s  e)kai/nisan.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: a)=r' o)rqo\n ai)/reis fi/ltaton to\ so\n ka/ra;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: h)\ ta\s o(moi/as a)nti/dos laba\s  labei=n,

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra

l.#text: kai\ th=sd' a)/kouson loisqi/ou boh=s, pa/ter,

l: oi)/ktire  qh=lun a)/rseno/s q' o(mou= go/non,
ou(/tw ga\r ou) te/qnhkas ou)de\ per qanw/n:
qano/nti: felloi\ d' w(\s a)/gousi di/ktuon,
to\n e)k buqou= klwsth=ra sw/|zontes li/nou.
a)/kou', u(pe\r sou= toia/d' e)/st' o)du/rmata.
au)to\s de\ sw/|zh| to/nde timh/sas lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: kai\ mh\n a)memfh= to/nd' e)tei/naton  lo/gon,

l: ta\ d' a)/ll', e)peidh\ dra=n katw/rqwsai freni/,

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: e)/stai: puqe/sqai d' ou)de/n e)st' e)/cw dro/mou,

l.#text: po/qen xoa\s e)/pemyen, e)k ti/nos lo/gou

l: qano/nti  d' ou) fronou=nti deilai/a xa/ris
e)pe/mpet': ou)k e)/xoim' a)\n ei)ka/sai to/de.
ta\ dw=ra mei/w  d' e)sti\ th=s a(marti/as.

l.#text: ta\ pa/nta ga/r tis e)kxe/as a)nq' ai(/matos

l: e(no/s, ma/thn o( mo/xqos: w(=d' e)/xei lo/gos.
qe/lonti d', ei)/per oi)=sq', e)moi\ fra/son ta/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: oi)=d', w)= te/knon, parh=  ga/r: e)/k t' o)neira/twn

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: h)= kai\ pe/pusqe tou)/nar, w(/st' o)rqw=s fra/sai;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tekei=n dra/kont' e)/docen, w(s au)th\ le/gei.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths

l.#text: semnoi\ me\n h)=san e)n qro/nois to/q' h(/menoi,

l: fi/loi de\ kai\  nu=n, w(s e)peika/sai pa/qh
kai\ cunqanei=sqai: kai\ ta/d' eu)o/rkws e)/xei.

l.#text: i)/desqe d' au)=te, tw=nd' e)ph/kooi kakw=n,

l: pe/das te xeiroi=n kai\ podoi=n cunwri/da.
ste/gastron a)ndro\s dei/caq', w(s i)/dh| path/r,

l.#text: ou)x ou(mo/s, a)ll' o( pa/nt' e)popteu/wn ta/de

l: w(s a)\n parh=| moi ma/rtus e)n di/kh| pote/,
w(s to/nd' e)gw\ meth=lqon e)ndi/kws mo/ron
to\n mhtro/s: *ai)gi/sqou ga\r ou) le/gw  mo/ron:

l.#text: e)/xei ga\r ai)sxunth=ros, w(s no/mos, di/khn:
h(/tis d' e)p' a)ndri\ tou=t' e)mh/sato stu/gos,

l: e)c ou(=  te/knwn h)/negx' u(po\  zw/nhn ba/ros,
fi/lon te/ws, nu=n d' e)xqro/n, w(s fai/nei, kako/n,
ti/ soi dokei=; mu/raina/ g' ei)/t'  e)/xidn' e)/fu

l.#text: sh/pein qigou=s' a)\n  a)/llon ou) dedhgme/non
ti/ nin prosei/pw, ka)\n tu/xw ma/l' eu)stomw=n;
a)/rkun t' a)\n  ei)/pois kai\ podisth=ras pe/plous.

l: bi/on nomi/zwn, tw=|de/ t' a)\n dolw/mati

l.#text: toia/d' e)moi\ cu/noikos e)n do/moisi mh\

l: ge/noit': o)loi/mhn pro/sqen  e)k qew=n a)/pais.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths

l.#text: e)/drasen h)\ ou)k e)/drase; marturei= de/ moi

l: fo/nou de\ khki\s cu\n xro/nw| cumba/lletai,

l.#text: nu=n au)to\n ai)nw=, nu=n a)poimw/zw parw/n,

l: a)lgw= me\n e)/rga kai\ pa/qos ge/nos te pa=n,

l.#text: mo/xqos  d' o( me\n au)ti/x', o( d' h(/cei.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: a)ll', w(s a)\n ei)dh=t', ou) ga\r  oi)=d' o(/ph telei=,
fre/nes du/sarktoi: pro\s de\ kardi/a| fo/bos
e(/ws d' e)/t'  e)/mfrwn ei)mi/, khru/ssw fi/lois
ktanei=n te/ fhmi mhte/r' ou)k a)/neu di/khs,
pra/canti me\n tau=t' e)kto\s ai)ti/as kakh=s
ei)=nai, pare/nta d'ou)k e)rw= th\n zhmi/an:

l.#text: kai\ nu=n o(ra=te/ m', w(s pareskeuasme/nos
cu\n tw=|de qallw=| kai\ ste/fei prosi/comai

l: feu/gwn to/d' ai(=ma koino/n: ou)d' e)f' e(sti/an

l.#text: kai\ marturei=n me\n w(s  e)porsu/nqh kaka\
ta/d' e)n xro/nw| moi pa/ntas *)argei/ous le/gw:

l: e)gw\ d' a)lh/ths th=sde gh=s a)po/cenos,
zw=n kai\ teqnhkw\s ta/sde klhdo/nas lipw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)ll' eu)= g' e)/pracas, mhd' e)pizeuxqh=|s  sto/ma

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

safw=s ga\r ai(/de mhtro\s e)/gkotoi ku/nes.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: potai/nion ga\r ai(=ma/ soi xeroi=n e)/ti:

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: u(mei=s me\n ou)x o(ra=te ta/sd', e)gw\ d' o(rw=:
e)lau/nomai de\ kou)ke/t' a)\n mei/naim'  e)gw\.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)ll' eu)tuxoi/hs, kai/ s' e)popteu/wn pro/frwn

l: nu=n d' au)= tri/tos h)=lqe/ poqen swth/r,
